评论详情: I'm a 32D and this surprisingly holds everything in during an upper body day. The only time they move enough for me to be concerned is when I do dead hangs, the shirt will go up showing some lower boob action. It's not about to pop out, yet not something I'm comfortable to leave be so I readjust. I love that there's no logo, so I can also wear this out of the gym. You can make the pads look invisible if you place one of its corners in the center of the shirt, the round part pointing to your armpit.

评论概述: Surprisingly high-quality thick material, with built-in pads
评论详情: I was very surprised by the material - it's thick and buttery, with built in pads. I wore this going out one night, and padded with some extra bikini pads for a little extra oomph. If I lifted my arms, the top more or less stayed put. I ordered a Medium, and it fit true to my 34C size. Super comfortable, and very flattering! If you have a larger chest, I'd be a little wary, but it's still worth to try on. I washed it in cold water, and hung to dry, and it looked good as new. Overall, I'd recommend this top.
I love this top.  The only thing I don't like is when I raise my arms up, the shirt goes up as well, almost showing my ladies.  Other than that, great material, and very sexy on
True to size and material is stretchy and soft
It is butter smooth and does such a good job with support! I am a group fitness instructor and wore it during my class and it was so comfy to move around in. Runs true to size!

评论概述: SIZE UP if you have wide shoulders/back!
评论详情: I really wanted to love this long sleeve crop top. The top itself is SO flattering and there are so many cute colorways. I'm 117 lbs, 5'1", 34B and regularly work out so my arms, back and shoulders are a little bit wider than average. I've tried this top in the colors black, mink, and dandelion brown so far. At first, I tried the black in my normal size small which was way too tight in the chest. I felt like my torso and arms could barely breathe, so I returned it for a medium in the same color. The medium fit perfectly in the chest, but the arms were still too tight and since the fabric is thick, it gets very warm very fast. Next, I tried the color mink because I figured that lighter colors might be a little more giving in the fabric (darker dyes tend to be more stiff/tight-fitting). The medium size mink was basically perfect, but the color wasn't flattering on me since I have pale, yellow-toned skin. The fabric of the mink color is way more stretchy, soft, and breathable. Last, I tried my chances again and purchased the dandelion brown in medium, but this basically had the same problem as the black fabric.  EDIT: Since writing this review, I have tried on the black top in a size large and have found this size to be the most comfortable for my wider shoulders and muscular arms. For some reason, the black fabric in a size large also feels a bit thinner, making it more soft and stretchy than the size medium I tried on previously. Even though the chest doesn't give as much of a "push-up" effect, I still prefer the size large because I could stack double bra pads in the top if I wanted to to fill out the chest a bit more and its not noticeable at all! Would totally recommend sizing up even 2 sizes if you have a muscular build and can't tolerate tightness in the arms.

I love this top, it looks great, fits like a glove, I don't even have to wear a bra! I got white and brown, the brown is perfect, the white I had to take out the bra cups because you could see them through the shirt but once I took those off you couldn't see through it. I want every color!

I purchased two of these tops one in a large and one in an extra large. I do not plan on wearing them to work out. I was going to use them as a bathing suit top when I wanted to cover my back and arms, but get some sun on my chest. The quality is thick and it comes with removable pads. I’m going to have to return both of them because I can barely move without the under boob showing. I really like the feel and look of this top and the colors are true as pictured but unfortunately it’s not gonna work for me.

I take out the pads and wear a sports bra under since it moves a lot and is also more revealing than what I prefer. This product isn’t for me and I will probably donate it. 评论概述: Snuggle Fit, Soft Fabric with Padding
评论详情: I wanted to spice things up at the gym and took a risk with this purchase, and I'm so glad I did! The material of this workout top is incredibly soft and comfortable, and it feels like a snuggly hug while I'm working out.  As a woman with a smaller chest, I was initially worried about the low v twist design on the front. However, the top provides great coverage and even adds a bit of fullness with the non-excessive padding. I feel confident and stylish wearing it during my workouts.  My only concern is that I wouldn't wear this top on days when I'm doing workouts that require a lot of arm motions. I found that the top rides up a bit, and I need to constantly adjust it after putting both of my arms up. But to be honest, this top is so cute that I would wear it as a casual outfit outside of the gym.  Overall, I highly recommend this top for anyone looking to add some fun and style to their workout wardrobe. It's a risk worth taking for the extra motivation at the gym!
